beginner.name: Push-ups
beginner.description: A basic exercise to strengthen the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

beginner.name: Bodyweight Squats
beginner.description: Squats performed using just your body weight.

beginner.name: Knee Raises
beginner.description: Lifting your knees to your chest while hanging from a bar.

beginner.name: Plank
beginner.description: A core stability exercise where you hold a position similar to a push-up.

beginner.name: Jumping Jacks
beginner.description: A cardiovascular exercise involving jumping with arms and legs extended.

beginner.name: Dips (Bench Dips)
beginner.description: Dips performed using a bench to target the triceps.

beginner.name: Leg Raises (Lying)
beginner.description: Lying on your back and raising your legs to work the lower abs.

beginner.name: Incline Push-ups
beginner.description: Push-ups with hands elevated on a bench or wall.

beginner.name: Burpees
beginner.description: A full-body exercise involving a squat, jump, and push-up.

beginner.name: Mountain Climbers
beginner.description: A high-intensity exercise involving a running motion in a plank position.

intermediate.name: Diamond Push-ups
intermediate.description: Push-ups with hands close together to target the triceps.

intermediate.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
intermediate.description: A single-leg squat with the rear leg elevated on a bench.

intermediate.name: Leg Raises (Hanging)
intermediate.description: Raising your legs while hanging from a bar to work the abs.

intermediate.name: Tricep Dips (Parallel Bars)
intermediate.description: Dips performed on parallel bars to target the triceps.

intermediate.name: Pike Push-ups
intermediate.description: A variation of push-ups with hips elevated to target the shoulders.

intermediate.name: Decline Push-ups
intermediate.description: Push-ups with feet elevated to increase difficulty.

intermediate.name: Australian Pull-ups
intermediate.description: Pull-ups performed with the body horizontal and feet on the ground.

intermediate.name: L-Sit Hold
intermediate.description: A core exercise where you hold an L-shape position using parallel bars or rings.

intermediate.name: Tuck Planche
intermediate.description: A planche variation where the knees are tucked to make the exercise easier.

intermediate.name: Pistol Squats
intermediate.description: A single-leg squat with the other leg extended forward.

advanced.name: Muscle-ups
advanced.description: A combination of a pull-up and dip in one fluid motion.

advanced.name: Pistol Squats (Weighted)
advanced.description: A single-leg squat performed with additional weight.

advanced.name: Front Lever Holds
advanced.description: Holding a horizontal position with your body parallel to the ground from a hanging bar.

advanced.name: One-Arm Push-ups
advanced.description: Push-ups performed using only one arm.

advanced.name: Handstand Push-ups
advanced.description: Push-ups performed while in a handstand position.

advanced.name: Human Flag
advanced.description: Holding a horizontal position with the body parallel to the ground while gripping a vertical pole.

advanced.name: Planche Holds
advanced.description: Holding a horizontal position with the body fully extended and parallel to the ground.

advanced.name: Toes-to-Bar
advanced.description: Raising your toes to the bar while hanging to work the core.

advanced.name: Back Lever Holds
advanced.description: Holding a horizontal position with the body parallel to the ground while hanging from a bar with the chest facing down.

advanced.name: Weighted Pull-ups
advanced.description: Pull-ups performed with additional weight attached.

chest.name: Bench Press
chest.description: Lifting a barbell while lying on a bench to target the chest.

chest.name: Incline Bench Press
chest.description: Bench press with the bench inclined to target the upper chest.

chest.name: Decline Bench Press
chest.description: Bench press with the bench declined to target the lower chest.

chest.name: Dumbbell Flyes
chest.description: Lying on a bench and bringing dumbbells together to target the chest.

chest.name: Cable Crossovers
chest.description: Using cable machines to bring the handles together in front of the chest.

chest.name: Push-ups (Various Styles)
chest.description: Different push-up variations to target various parts of the chest.

chest.name: Chest Dips
chest.description: Dips performed with a forward lean to emphasize the chest.

chest.name: Pec Deck Machine
chest.description: Machine exercise targeting the chest by bringing the arms together.

chest.name: Chest Press Machine
chest.description: Machine-based bench press to target the chest.

chest.name: Floor Press
chest.description: Bench press performed while lying on the floor to limit the range of motion.

back.name: Deadlifts
back.description: Lifting a barbell from the ground to work the entire posterior chain.

back.name: Pull-ups (Wide Grip, Close Grip)
back.description: Pull-ups with various grip widths to target different back muscles.

back.name: Bent Over Rows
back.description: Rowing a barbell towards the torso while bent over to target the back.

back.name: Lat Pulldowns
back.description: Pulling a bar down towards the chest to target the lats.

back.name: T-Bar Rows
back.description: Rowing a barbell with one end fixed to the floor to target the middle back.

back.name: Seated Rows
back.description: Using a rowing machine to pull a handle towards the torso.

back.name: Dumbbell Rows
back.description: Rowing a dumbbell towards the torso while in a bent-over position.

back.name: Hyperextensions
back.description: Extending the back while lying face down on a hyperextension bench.

back.name: Renegade Rows
back.description: Rowing dumbbells while in a plank position.

back.name: Face Pulls
back.description: Pulling a cable towards the face to target the rear delts and upper back.

shoulders.name: Overhead Press
shoulders.description: Pressing a barbell or dumbbells overhead to target the shoulders.

shoulders.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
shoulders.description: Pressing dumbbells overhead while seated or standing.

shoulders.name: Lateral Raises
shoulders.description: Raising dumbbells to the side to target the lateral deltoids.

shoulders.name: Front Raises
shoulders.description: Raising dumbbells to the front to target the anterior deltoids.

shoulders.name: Rear Delt Flyes
shoulders.description: Lifting dumbbells to the side while bent over to target the rear delts.

shoulders.name: Arnold Press
shoulders.description: A shoulder press variation with a rotation at the top.

shoulders.name: Upright Rows
shoulders.description: Pulling a barbell or dumbbells up to the chin to target the traps and delts.

shoulders.name: Face Pulls
shoulders.description: Pulling a cable towards the face to target the rear delts and upper back.

shoulders.name: Shrugs
shoulders.description: Lifting the shoulders towards the ears to target the traps.

shoulders.name: Cable Lateral Raises
shoulders.description: Raising the arm to the side using a cable machine.

legs.name: Squats (Back, Front)
legs.description: Lowering the body by bending the knees while holding a barbell on the back or front.

legs.name: Deadlifts (Conventional, Sumo)
legs.description: Lifting a barbell from the ground using different stances.

legs.name: Leg Press
legs.description: Pressing a weighted platform away with the legs while seated.

legs.name: Lunges
legs.description: Stepping forward and lowering the body to target the quads and glutes.

legs.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
legs.description: A single-leg squat with the rear leg elevated.

legs.name: Leg Curls
legs.description: Curling the legs against resistance while lying on a machine.

legs.name: Leg Extensions
legs.description: Extending the legs against resistance while seated.

legs.name: Calf Raises
legs.description: Raising the heels off the ground to target the calves.

legs.name: Step-ups
legs.description: Stepping onto a platform with one leg to target the quads and glutes.

legs.name: Hip Thrusts
legs.description: Lifting the hips towards the ceiling while resting the upper back on a bench.

arms.name: Bicep Curls (Barbell, Dumbbell)
arms.description: Curling a barbell or dumbbells to target the biceps.

arms.name: Hammer Curls
arms.description: Curling dumbbells with a neutral grip to target the brachialis.

arms.name: Preacher Curls
arms.description: Curling a barbell or dumbbells while seated at a preacher bench.

arms.name: Tricep Extensions
arms.description: Extending the arms overhead to target the triceps.

arms.name: Skull Crushers
arms.description: Lying on a bench and extending a barbell towards the forehead to target the triceps.

arms.name: Tricep Dips
arms.description: Dips performed to target the triceps, can be assisted or weighted.

arms.name: Concentration Curls
arms.description: Curling a dumbbell while seated with the elbow resting on the thigh.

arms.name: Cable Bicep Curls
arms.description: Curling a cable towards the biceps to target the arms.

arms.name: Overhead Tricep Extensions
arms.description: Extending the arms overhead with a dumbbell or cable to target the triceps.

arms.name: Kickbacks
arms.description: Extending the arms behind the body with a dumbbell to target the triceps.

low_impact.name: Walking
low_impact.description: A low-impact cardiovascular exercise performed at a steady pace.

low_impact.name: Cycling
low_impact.description: Pedaling on a stationary or outdoor bike to improve cardiovascular fitness.

low_impact.name: Elliptical Trainer
low_impact.description: Using an elliptical machine to perform a low-impact cardio workout.

low_impact.name: Rowing Machine
low_impact.description: Using a rowing machine to perform a full-body, low-impact cardio workout.

low_impact.name: Swimming
low_impact.description: Performing laps in the pool to get a full-body, low-impact cardiovascular workout.

low_impact.name: Aqua Aerobics
low_impact.description: Performing aerobic exercises in water to reduce impact on the joints.

low_impact.name: Stepping
low_impact.description: Using a step platform to perform a low-impact cardiovascular workout.

low_impact.name: Recumbent Bike
low_impact.description: Cycling on a recumbent bike with a reclined seating position to reduce impact on the joints.

low_impact.name: Arm Ergometer
low_impact.description: Using an arm bike to perform a low-impact cardio workout for the upper body.

high_impact.name: Running (Treadmill, Outdoor)
high_impact.description: Running at various speeds on a treadmill or outdoors to improve cardiovascular fitness.

high_impact.name: Jump Rope
high_impact.description: Jumping over a rope that is swung under the feet to improve cardiovascular fitness.

high_impact.name: HIIT (High-Intensity Interval Training)
high_impact.description: Alternating between high-intensity and low-intensity exercises for cardiovascular and metabolic conditioning.

high_impact.name: Stair Climbing
high_impact.description: Climbing stairs to improve cardiovascular fitness and build lower body strength.

high_impact.name: Plyometrics
high_impact.description: Explosive exercises like jump squats and box jumps to improve power and cardiovascular fitness.

high_impact.name: Sprinting
high_impact.description: Performing short bursts of high-speed running to improve speed and cardiovascular fitness.

high_impact.name: Agility Drills
high_impact.description: Performing exercises that improve quickness and coordination, such as ladder drills.

high_impact.name: Burpees
high_impact.description: A full-body exercise involving a squat, jump, and push-up.

high_impact.name: Box Jumps
high_impact.description: Jumping onto a box or platform to improve explosive power and cardiovascular fitness.

high_impact.name: High Knees
high_impact.description: Running in place while lifting the knees as high as possible to improve cardiovascular fitness.

clean_and_jerk.name: Clean
clean_and_jerk.description: Lifting a barbell from the ground to the shoulders in one motion.

clean_and_jerk.name: Jerk
clean_and_jerk.description: Lifting a barbell from the shoulders to overhead in one motion.

clean_and_jerk.name: Power Clean
clean_and_jerk.description: A shorter range of motion version of the clean that ends with the barbell at shoulder height.

clean_and_jerk.name: Hang Clean
clean_and_jerk.description: Performing the clean from a hanging position rather than from the floor.

clean_and_jerk.name: Clean and Press
clean_and_jerk.description: Combining the clean and press into a single movement.

clean_and_jerk.name: Clean and Squat
clean_and_jerk.description: Performing the clean and then immediately transitioning into a squat.

snatch.name: Snatch
snatch.description: Lifting a barbell from the ground to overhead in one continuous motion.

snatch.name: Power Snatch
snatch.description: A shorter range of motion version of the snatch that ends with the barbell overhead.

snatch.name: Hang Snatch
snatch.description: Performing the snatch from a hanging position rather than from the floor.

snatch.name: Overhead Squat
snatch.description: Squatting while holding the barbell overhead.

accessories.name: Deadlifts (Sumo, Conventional)
accessories.description: Lifting a barbell from the ground with different stances.

accessories.name: Romanian Deadlifts
accessories.description: A variation of the deadlift focusing on the hamstrings and lower back.

accessories.name: Front Squats
accessories.description: Squatting with the barbell held in front of the shoulders.

accessories.name: Back Squats
accessories.description: Squatting with the barbell resting on the upper back.

accessories.name: Push Press
accessories.description: Pressing a barbell overhead using a slight leg drive.

accessories.name: Thrusters
accessories.description: A combination of a front squat and overhead press.

squat_variations.name: Back Squat
squat_variations.description: Squatting with the barbell resting on the upper back.

squat_variations.name: Front Squat
squat_variations.description: Squatting with the barbell held in front of the shoulders.

squat_variations.name: Box Squat
squat_variations.description: Squatting onto a box to help with depth and technique.

squat_variations.name: Paused Squat
squat_variations.description: Squatting with a pause at the bottom of the movement.

bench_press_variations.name: Flat Bench Press
bench_press_variations.description: Lifting a barbell while lying on a flat bench.

bench_press_variations.name: Incline Bench Press
bench_press_variations.description: Bench press with the bench inclined to target the upper chest.

bench_press_variations.name: Decline Bench Press
bench_press_variations.description: Bench press with the bench declined to target the lower chest.

bench_press_variations.name: Close-Grip Bench Press
bench_press_variations.description: Bench press with hands placed closer together to emphasize the triceps.

deadlift_variations.name: Conventional Deadlift
deadlift_variations.description: Lifting a barbell from the ground with a standard stance.

deadlift_variations.name: Sumo Deadlift
deadlift_variations.description: Lifting a barbell from the ground with a wide stance.

deadlift_variations.name: Romanian Deadlift
deadlift_variations.description: Lifting a barbell with a focus on the hamstrings and lower back.

deadlift_variations.name: Deficit Deadlift
deadlift_variations.description: Performing the deadlift from an elevated position to increase range of motion.
